metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5943 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Request Tracker (RT) 4.x before 4.0.25, 4.2.x before 4.2.14, and 4.4.xbefore 4.4.2 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information aboutcross-site request forgery (CSRF) verification tokens via a crafted URL.

criterions.comment: request-tracker4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
